description:
The law firm of Jenkins Block & Associates, P.C., has a long history of service to the residents of Maryland and Virginia. Since 1977, our firm has proudly served the people of the Hagerstown area who have suffered injuries while at work or because of others' negligent acts. If you are suffering, you can trust the attorneys at our law firm to help you navigate the legal processes related to the following:

•         Personal injury compensation

•         Workers' compensation

•         Social Security Disability

•         Supplemental Security Income

•         Service-related disability

Our personal injury attorneys have experience with a wide range of case types, including medical malpractice, automobile accidents, and product and premises liability. They will take the time to carefully examine the details of your situation, determine the amount of compensation you deserve for your pain and suffering, and provide guidance and support throughout the legal process.

Similarly, our workers' compensation and Social Security attorneys have helped clients whose disabilities or on-the-job injuries stemmed from a wide range of causes. They will work with medical professionals to ensure the true extent of your disability or injury is demonstrated in your claim, and help you pursue the benefits you need to recover or receive the long-term care and financial support you need.

If you are injured or disabled, the attorneys at the law firm of Jenkins Block & Associates, P.C., can help you in the aftermath of your accident or injury. During a free initial consultation, you can discuss your situation with one of our lawyers.
